Job Description: Roles and ResponsibilitiesTech Lead - SDE / Sr. SdeLocation: Pune Exp. 6.0 - 10.0 YearsMust-Have:- Working in any good product firm- Min 6 yrs of end to end experience working in React js- Strong experience in Frontend development HTML5, CSS3, UI design aspects- Mandatory Skillset & Tools: React JS, HTML5, CSS3, Java script, PWA, SSR - Primary Skill: HTML5, React, UI design aspects, Javascript, JQuery, GIT & version control, Responsive design, Android and IoS app development, Progressive web app, Testing & Debugging skills, JIRA, Bug Zilla, Confluence, Sharepoints.- Secondary Skill: Spring MVC, Java 1.8 and above, Angular, UI Load testing, REST Web services, Basic shell commands, Linux, Good written, verbal and presentation skillsObjectives/Responsibilities of this Role :- Understand the design requirements from the UX- Development of UI and the implementation of front-end business logic- Collaboration with UX and backend team for data population- Working experience into Agile and Scrum methodologies Qualification: BE/B.Tech in any stream
